paper_abstract: The construction of stochastic solutions is a powerful method to obtain localized solutions in configuration or Fourier space and for parallel computation with domain decomposition. Here a stochastic solution is obtained for the magnetohydrodynamics equations. Some details are given concerning the numerical implementation of the solution which is illustrated by an example of generation of long-range magnetic fields by a velocity source. (C) 2013 Elsevier Inc. All rights reserved.
paper_title: A stochastic approach to the solution of magnetohydrodynamic equations
